reviewText: Two full length movies from the late 1940=50s with Lana Turner at her best. These pictures are not sexy movies at all they are mysteries, dark movies - you can only take in small doses.  This type of movie lingers in the mind and has you thinking about them for days.  I can see why she was a star.  John Forsyth also stars in one of the films, he is great, too.

Hello & i am back once again just to say from my favorite movie genres!!!!!!! Body Chemistry & Body Chemistry 2 are great movies for any casual  movie lover like me!!! (: Such as part 1 you have the actor played by the great Marc Singer!! who is a dedicated hard worker & devoted husband & father!! who once again slips into the seduction of a beautiful sexy co-worker played by Lisa Pescia!! who give him all of his fantasies & desires!! who leads him into a fit of rage & she drives him to a place where he cannot drive back.... Part 2 is played by the great actor Gregory Harrison of Trapper john m.d. & so forth he is a former big time small town football jock!! who move back to town & falls for his old high school sweetheart played by beautiful actress Robin Riker!! & once again that is not enough he too falls for the very sexy & seductive Clair Archer of part 1 & 2 a sexy radio seductress!! played by the very sexy sultry Lisa Pescia!! who trust me she plays the part!!! So please tune in for this double feature for your doubled pleasure!!! ah!! Chow (:(:(:

I ordered this movie for a friend.  Body Chemistry is one of his all time favorites and it came with Body Chemistry 2 as an extra bonus.  This DVD is always in his DVD player, he has watched it several times.  Whenever we go to his house to watch a movie he has to take this one out of the DVD player first.  He has thanked me several times for finding it for him.  I'm happy to have found it for him too.
a sexy thriller  with hot stars,you love it and cheer  for the woman in this film
Awesome old school movie brings back some fond memories. Will enjoy watching again and again as the acting is mediocre yet great for the movies thank you
Both these movies were ok but not my cup of tea.  The price was right and I thought I would give them a try.
